p: The compound yielding a fragment at m/z 229 (Rt 2.83 min) was identified as 3′,5′,4–trihydroxy-resveratrol-3- O- β-rutinoside ( 3). It was obtained as a brown solid from Fraction 2. The molecular ion [M + H] + ( m/z 537.336) obtained from HR-ESI-MS is consistent with the formula C 26H 32O 12. The 1H and 13C spectral data ( Figure S4) obtained corresponded to that reported in literature [ 27, 28, 34].
